messages.subject: The Unschooling/Worldschooling Experience
messages.msgSnippet: Apologies for the cross-posting but I wanted to get the word out quickly -- Steve Cooperman contacted me a couple weeks ago about arranging an opportunity for
messages.messageBody:
Apologies for the cross-posting but I wanted to get the word out
quickly --

Steve Cooperman contacted me a couple weeks ago about arranging an
opportunity for he and Eli Gerzon to speak to unschoolers in Iowa.
Iï¿½m excited to announce their presentation: The Unschooling/
Worldschooling Experience: What Happens When You Follow Your Passion?
on Sunday, October 28, 2007 from 2:30 - 4:30 p.m. at the West Des
Moines Library Community Room.

Seating is limited so please email me at: iowaunschoolers at gmail
dot com to reserve your seats.

You can read more about Steve and Eli here:
http://liberatedlearning.wordpress.com/2007/10/17/the-
unschoolingworldschooling-experience/


Chris
Radically Unschooling in Iowa
Learning in the (F)unzone




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
